thread.title: The In-Water Power Boat Show hosted in Atlantic City extends its run this weekend!
thread.title_full: The In-Water Power Boat Show hosted in Atlantic City extends its run this weekend! - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The In-Water Power Boat Show hosted in Atlantic City extends its run this weekend!
text:
In-Water Power Boat Show, Inc
ATLANTIC CITY, N.J. , Oct. 9, The rain may have kept you away last weekend but the Atlantic City In-Water Boat Show has extended its run this Friday, Saturday & Sunday at the Golden Nugget Casino Hotel & Marina. Don't miss your chance to climb aboard the hottest new 2016 models. Sport Cruisers, Express Yachts, Sport Fishing Yachts, Walk-arounds, Cuddies, Bow Riders, catamarans and more, from sixteen to sixty-five feet. There has never been a better time to buy. Prices have never been lower. Deals have never been greater. And this weekend your paid ticket includes admission to the "Smokin' Hot Atlantic City BBQ Championship" on Saturday & Sunday. Did we mention Parking is FREE?
Don't miss the Marine Accessory Mart featuring marine electronics, fishing equipment & supplies, lifts, towers, repair facilities, training, boat financing and insurance. While checking the latest styles and trends, you'll want to refuel and listen to the bands on the marina deck.
All of the "major" boat manufacturers and regional retail boat dealers from the region will be "PREVIEWING the INTRODUCTION of the NEWEST MODELS" (never seen before) for the 2016 Model Year! Don't forget we also have beautiful pre-owned models!
The Atlantic City Show runs Friday- Sunday, October 9-11 , 10am-6pm
Admission is $10 , online and at the gate, for ADULTS and FREE for children under 12. Your PAID admission includes a FREE subscription to your choice of Boating, Field & Stream, Outdoor Life, or Mens Journal.
More manufacturers, more exhibitors, more reasons to Board It, Love It, Buy It. Be a part of the excitement for the day or spend the weekend! Parking is FREE at the Golden Nugget Casino Hotel!
From Sea Ray to Chaparral to Regal to Formula to Monterey...from Grady White to Regulator to Pursuit to Robalo to Cobia to Sea Hunt to Tidewater to Yellow Fin to Jupiter to Everglades to Davis...from Viking to Prestige to Carver to Azimut to Ocean to Albamarine to Topaz to Predator... from Premier to Bennington to Hurricane to Godfrey Pontoon Boat Line featuring Sweetwater , Sweetwater Premium, Aqua Patio and Sanpan... from Glacier Bay to World Cat to Carolina Cat we have it all. More manufacturers, more exhibitors, more reasons to Board It, Love It, Buy It. Be a part of the excitement for the day or spend the weekend!
